alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 05 at 10:08AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 94 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA ASCENSION EAST BATON ROUGE EAST FELICIANA IBERVILLE LIVINGSTON ST. HELENA ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA WASHINGTON WEST BATON ROUGE IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI HANCOCK PEARL RIVER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADDIS, AMITE, BATON ROUGE, BAY ST. LOUIS, BAYOU SORREL, BOGALUSA, BRUSLY, CLINTON, COVINGTON, CROSSROADS, DARLINGTON, DENHAM SPRINGS, DIAMONDHEAD, DONALDSONVILLE, EASLEYVILLE, ENON, FELPS, FRANKLINTON, GONZALES, GREENSBURG, HAMMOND, JACKSON, LACOMBE, MANDEVILLE, MCNEIL, MONTPELIER, PICAYUNE, PLAQUEMINE, PONCHATOULA, PORT ALLEN, PRAIRIEVILLE, ROBERT, SLIDELL, WALKER, WATSON, WAVELAND, AND WHITE CASTLE.
